text: We have ranted about everything and anything and I strangely feel blessed that i could do that with you xD. Pehle sem se tujhe nachwane ki bhot koshish ki par har bar dasse marne ki lalach me kat jata tha bc, Jate Jate kar hi liya par vo bhi. Shimla aur goa tere bina adhoore hote, I hope ki aage aur bhi trips saath karte aur jate rahenge xD
author: Aakarsh  Singh

text: Keede, first year me ek dusre ke room me paani dalne se fourth year me ek dusre ke room me aake sutta marne tak, bhot happy journey thi tere saath jo humesha yaad aayega.I am sure agar apan ek baap ke bete na hote to bhi itni hi bakchodi karte. Fir aage zarur milenge 'bina soche' sutta fukne xD
author: Aakarsh  Singh

text:
Tujhse itna intimidate hota hu main ki memoir me kuch galat na hojaye uska bhi dar lag rha hai, jk xD. I don't like horror movies but I really enjoyed watching them with you, I really wish ki main bangalore me aur din ruk pata. Tere samne funny hona has been a task but I hope we stay in touch so that I can keep trying.

PS - Thank you for the compliment, tere compliment ki vajah se hi ab nind aa pati hai xD
author: Aakarsh  Singh

text:
Dance club ne bhot kuch diya jo main lifetime cherish karunga aur unme se jo sabse achi chiz di vo tu hai, shayad hi koi esa din hoga campus me jab ek dusre ke bina maa chudai ho. Itni memories hai saath me ki agar idhar likh diya to yearbook me fit nhi hoga mera memoir. 2 mahine saath rakhne ke liye abhi thank you nahi bolunga kyuki firse kabhi na kabhi rehne aaunga xD
Dost nahi bhai hai tu.
author: Aakarsh  Singh

text:
Roz jhagdne se roz saath daaru peene tak ka ye  4 saal ka samay kab khatam hogya tere saath pata nhi chala. Ghoda yaha bhi respectable hi rakhte hai xD
Poker khelega aaj?
author: Aakarsh  Singh

text: Man to nahi hai tere liye memoir likhne ka par fir bhi likh de rha hu taki mujhe yaad rahe ki tu kabhi dost tha xD. First year me C Block ke terrace pe subah tak bitching karne se shuru hua tha aur fourth year me G block ke terrace pe akhri din subah tak saath me rone tak ye dosti jese tese chal gayi. I hope job location mumbai mil jaye,nahi mila to bhi jaipur aana jaana to chalta rahega.
author: Aakarsh  Singh

text:
Rana madarchod, tere bina krump karna ek nightmare jesa lagta hai ab, ek duo karna tha DE me jo pending hi reh gaya :( saale ek bhi trip saath me nhi gaya itni baar bulaya, par aage bhi puchta rahunga I hope agli trip saath chal le :*
Apni galat news aur complaints humesha sunate rehna <3
author: Aakarsh  Singh
